Token.Abstract: C4Gesture protocol groups methods that are fundamental to basic interaction with all C4 objects which have a visible, on-screen presence.
Adds a gesture to an object.

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: defines the type of gesture that will be added, should be one of C4GestureType (e.g. TAP, PINCH, SWIPERIGHT, SWIPELEFT, SWIPEUP, SWIPEDOWN, ROTATION, PAN, LONGPRESS).

Parameter.Name: gestureName
Parameter.Abstract: a string (can be anything) which identifies the current gesture, so that it can be accessed later on.

Parameter.Name: methodName
Parameter.Abstract: a string which represents the name of a method defined in the object's class or any of its superclasses, this parameter should be written as a string (e.g. @"test", @"changePosition:")

Token.Abstract: Specifies the number of taps required for a given gesture.

Parameter.Name: tapCount
Parameter.Abstract: the desired number of required taps

Parameter.Name: gestureName
Parameter.Abstract: a string identifying the gesture upon which this method should act. The value of gestureName should correspond to the name of a gesture already added using the addGesture:name:action: method

Token.Abstract: Specifies the number of touches required for a given gesture.

Parameter.Name: touchCount
Parameter.Abstract: the desired number of required touches

Parameter.Name: gestureName
Parameter.Abstract: a string identifying the gesture upon which this method should act. The value of gestureName should correspond to the name of a gesture already added using the addGesture:name:action: method

Token.Abstract: Specifies the minimum number of touches required for a given gesture.

Parameter.Name: touchCount
Parameter.Abstract: the desired minimum number of touches

Parameter.Name: gestureName
Parameter.Abstract: a string identifying the gesture upon which this method should act. The value of gestureName should correspond to the name of a gesture already added using the addGesture:name:action: method

Token.Abstract: Specifies the maximum number of touches required for a given gesture.

Parameter.Name: touchCount
Parameter.Abstract: the desired maximum number of touches

Parameter.Name: gestureName
Parameter.Abstract: a string identifying the gesture upon which this method should act. The value of gestureName should correspond to the name of a gesture already added using the addGesture:name:action: method

Token.Abstract: Specifies the direction for a given swipe gesture.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: the desired direction for the swipe gesture

Parameter.Name: gestureName
Parameter.Abstract: a string identifying the gesture upon which this method should act. The value of gestureName should correspond to the name of a gesture already added using the addGesture:name:action: method

Token.Abstract: Specifies the direction for a given swipe gesture.

Parameter.Name: duration
Parameter.Abstract: the desired number of seconds (defaults to 0.5)

Parameter.Name: gestureName
Parameter.Abstract: a string identifying the gesture upon which this method should act. The value of gestureName should correspond to the name of a gesture already added using the addGesture:name:action: method

Token.Abstract: Method which is called each time an object is touched
Method which is called each time an object is finished being touched
Method which is called each time touches associated with an object are moved
Default method which is called each time an object receives a long press
Method which is called each time an object receives a long press

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: the object that is sending the pressedLong: message.

Token.Abstract: Method which is called each time an object receives a swipe from left to right
Method which is called each time an object receives a swipe from left to right

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: a UIGestureRecognizer object.

Token.Abstract: Method which is called each time an object receives a swipe from right to left
Default method which is called each time an object receives a swipe from right to left

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: a UIGestureRecognizer object.

Token.Abstract: Method which is called each time an object receives a swipe from down to up
Method which is called each time an object receives a swipe from down to up

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: a UIGestureRecognizer object.

Token.Abstract: Method which is called each time an object receives a swipe from up to down
Method which is called each time an object receives a swipe from up to down

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: a UIGestureRecognizer object.

Token.Abstract: A default method which can be called when using a PAN gesture, if the object is to follow a moving touch

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: a UIGestureRecognizer object.

Token.Abstract: The basic method that gets called when a tap gesture gets recognized.
Default method which is called each time an object receives a tap gesture.

Parameter.Name: sender
Parameter.Abstract: a UIGestureRecognizer object.

Token.Abstract: Returns the UIGesture associated with a specified gesture name for the receiver.

Parameter.Name: gestureName
Parameter.Abstract: the name of the gesture to retrieve.

Token.Abstract: Returns a dictionary of all the gestures associated with the receiver.
